ad_1768038650214.title: Learn: Modular Chassis Assembly
ad_1768038650214.content: Review the blueprint for the SEED-Home chassis. Mint 0.5 AT for your attention.

ad_1768038650219.title: Safety Audit: Weld Points
ad_1768038650219.content: Verify the weld point locations on the primary pillars. Crucial for structural integrity.
